#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define s(n) scanf("%lld",&n);
int main()
{
    char s[51];
    long long i,t;
    s(t);
    getchar();
    while(t--)
    {
        gets(s);
        for(i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
        {
            if((s[i]>='a'&&s[i]<='m')||(s[i]>='A'&&s[i]<='M'))
                s[i]=s[i]+13;
            else if((s[i]>='n'&&s[i]<='z')||(s[i]>='N'&&s[i]<='Z'))
                s[i]=s[i]-13;
            else if(s[i]>='0'&&s[i]<='4')
                s[i]=s[i]+5;
            else if(s[i]>='5'&&s[i]<='9')
                s[i]=s[i]-5;
 
        }
        puts(s);
    }
return 0;
}
